Adblocker for Chrome - NoAds is your ultimate solution to a cleaner, faster, and more secure browsing experience. This extension brings you enhanced performance with extended filterlists and robust features, now completely independent.

Key Adblocker Features:

• Advanced Ad Removal: Our adblocker blocks ads on all websites, ensuring a clutter-free browsing experience.
• Malware and Adware Blocking: Protect your device from malicious threats with our comprehensive adblocker.
• Performance Boost: Improve browsing speed by eliminating unnecessary content with our efficient adblocker.
• YouTube Adblocker: Remove ads, banners, and pre-rolls from YouTube with our specialized YouTube adblocker feature.
• Anti-Adblock Bypass: Our adblocker gets rid of "Anti-Adblock" banners and detectors.
• Integrated Popup Blocker: Stop unwanted popups from disrupting your browsing with our all-in-one adblocker solution.

Latest Adblocker Updates:

Version 4.0.16
• Minor Adblocker Bugfixes

Version 4.0.15
• Minor Adblocker Bugfixes

Version 4.0.13
• Major YouTube Adblocker Update with dynamic rules 
• Another Migration Bugfix

Version 4.0.11
• Bug Fix for migration of previous Adblocker Data
• Anonymized Adblocker Statistics

Version 4.0.9
• Migration to Manifest V3 for enhanced adblocker security and performance.
• Simplified Adblocker Filterlist Selection.
• Adblocker Notification Options.
• Improved Adblocker Privacy Settings.
• Adblocker Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.

Additional Adblocker Features:

• Periodic Updates: Our adblocker uses the alarms permission to create and refresh alarms periodically, ensuring up-to-date ad blocking capabilities.
• Configuration Management: Utilizes a 'cfg' variable to manage and retrieve adblocker settings, allowing for a customizable ad-blocking experience.
• Privacy-Focused: No personal information is collected or stored during these adblocker update checks.

Choose NoAds as your go-to Chrome adblocker for a superior, ad-free browsing experience!
